title: 我的世界1.8.5有添加了什么啊？？？
author: MCBBS粉丝
txt_content: 三天没玩我的世界就发现我的世界从1.8.4更新到1.8.5，都更了些什么啊

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
似乎只是修复了一些bug而已...
详见这帖
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-447814-1-1.html

replies.author: restp
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: MC我的往事
replies.txt_content:
BUG列表：

?[Bug MC-79632] – Phantom Custom Player in Scoreboard / UUIDs of non-player entities on scoreboards truncated after relog
?非玩家实体记分板名字在退出重进后变短
?[Bug MC-75630] – Exploit with signs and command blocks
?开采告示牌和命令方块
?[Bug MC-80478] – Better server validation for movement packets
?服务端能更好地验证（实体）运动的包
?[Bug MC-80479] – Invalid beacon effects are not validated
?无效信标效果不合法
?[Bug MC-80480] – Certain attribute values are not bound
?部分属性不受限
